question: What is the name of the book that addresses ways students can tackle stress during examinations has been released?
explanation: Prime Minister Narendra Modi has now come up with a special gift for the youngsters, especially the students in the country. He has penned a book for all the students that will help them deal with the stress and anxiety they face during the examination season. It is Titled 'Exam Warriors', the book is a first-of-its-kind initiative by a serving Prime Minister, according to reports.
